grails.util
Class BuildSettingsHolder

java.lang.Object
  grails.util.BuildSettingsHolder

public final class BuildSettingsHolder
extends Object

Static singleton holder for the BuildSettings instance. Should only be initialised once (in GrailsScriptRunner.
